original_text: When the other ten disciples heard about this, they were angry with James and John.
korean_text: 열 제자가 듣고 야고보와 요한에 대하여 화를 내거늘

sentences.original_text: When the other ten disciples heard about this
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 열 명의 제자들이 이 일을 듣고서

sentences.original_text: they were angry with James and John
